channel.title: Computers Laptop Linux Porn on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Today is a rather good day
item.description: I got all my computers yesterday. I think I got some more work. which leads to more computers. which leads to more work. or something like that. Yesterday .. I went and played with the smallest cat in the world. I want a kitten. I like kittens. they are so nice.. so anyway.. my computers. the laptop is so so so small. it will be nice to have around. I gotta set up the WLAN so that I can surf porn in the kitchen(eep) or whatever.
